title: Superb Place
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Place is super but the voice
review: I stayed in these suites with my family  in April 2019 , the suits are super clean and well furnished with all facilities .  the best thing is the staff  which is super friendly and helpful in all ways . the best part is the location , it like living right in the middle of  Istanbul from there you can go to istaklal  street on foot  and old city in Bus and train service which is accessible right in front  of suites . it has cafe's all around it of all type of cuisines and a TAXI service main office  is just beside this hotel. so no matter what is the timing of your fligh you can catch a taxi right away in cheap prices.

title: Location
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your kind comments on this website.  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, appreciating both our facilities and service. It is a real pleasure to receive such positive feedback.  I look forward to welcoming you back to the Taxim Suites soon.  Kind regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Stank of smoke - false advertising, the staff didn't understand why it might be an issue
review: Even the place is so close to taksim and taksim metro but it is so loudly place because of location (( and I stayed in Miyako suits and room is smell cook and meal all time and disturb us. You can go 5 minutes from there to taksim that’s why I choose

title: Not so great
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your kind comments on this website.  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, appreciating both our facilities and service. It is a real pleasure to receive such positive feedback.  I look forward to welcoming you back to the Taxim Suites soon.  Kind regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Charming hotel with an excellent location.
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Clean and comfortable stay
review: Charming place. We got two adjoining suites on the 3rd floor which were modern and comfortable.  Central location, with lots of restaurants and stores around. Easy access to public transport and taxis. Quaint little 2 person elevator.  Breakfast was mediocre, and giving it a miss would not be much of a sacrifice.  Washer and dryer in the basement.  They accommodated us with a baggage hold service, while we went on a week long tour of the Kachkar Mountains.  Good option if you want to stay in the Taksim Square area and are on a budget.

title: A Memorable Stay at the Penthouse Suites...
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank You for sharing your lovely comment about our hotel and rewarding review about your experience. We would be delighted to welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Great location, everything was within your reach
review: We stayed in Taxim Suites for two days. Our room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. We stayed in Park Suite, where we had a convenient kitchen and a spacious living room. Also the staff was very helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Excellent location, wonderful staff and very comfortable rooms
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your kind comments on this website.  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, appreciating both our facilities and service. It is a real pleasure to receive such positive feedback.  I look forward to welcoming you back to the Taxim Suites soon.  Kind regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Lovely Boutique Hotel
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Centrally located, great rooms, customer service is great
review: What a hidden treasure is this lovely boutique hotel located in the heart of Taxim.  The rooms are spacious, very clean and have all the modern conveniences of a large hotel - full breakfast, fitness room, laundry.  The customer service was outstanding - they went above and beyond for every one of our requests.    I look forward to returning to Istanbul (amazing city) in the Spring and staying at the Taxim Suites.  I would highly reccommend staying at the Taxim.  Elizabeth Hogan from the United States.

title: Consistent quality, excellent service.
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for your review, it is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us . Please be informed that I will happily be sharing your feedback with our team. I look forward to welcoming you back soon again; until then, take good care.   Best wishes  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: The best
review: My sister lives in Istanbul and set us up here for the first few nights to get over jetlag and become familiar with Istanbul before coming to stay with her. I can't say enough  about how great those three nights were. The hotel lobby is charming with an old-school elevator that matches the city's old school charm. The Mandarin suite we stayed in had a contemporary chic feel to it. All amenities (showers, sinks, etc.) worked great. And although located in the heart of Taksim Square, noise was never an issue. The real strength of this hotel is its customer service. I'd like to single out Esin Gulum, who went above and beyond excellent in helping arrange cars, helping with laundry, etc. (In fact I believe she stayed past her shift to see that my mother's laundry was finished.) She…

title: Spacious Suites and Excellent Location!
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your kind comments on this website.  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, appreciating both our facilities and service. It is a real pleasure to receive such positive feedback.  I look forward to welcoming you back to the Taxim Suites soon.  Kind regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Secure, Comfortable, Clean, Very Good Standard
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: comfortable and convenient
review: We had a pleasant stay. The Hotel was secure, spacious, Clean, very Good Standard. The staff spoke English and were Polite and very helpful. Mehmet Demir was very helpful and professional. The Hotel is in a very convenient location and security is not a issue. Internet was fast which was great. We have a pleasant time and stay. we would definitely stay here again.

title: Excellent quality for the price!
review: Dear Valued Guest  Greetings from İstanbul Taxim Suites  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. It was great pleasure to host you.Your feedback will be shared with the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional guest service.   We hope to welcome you, whenever your travel needs bring you to this beautiful city Istanbul.  Sincerely,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Help on time
review: check in - was at a small desk in the small lobby . Friendly and welcoming and helpful . A porter helped me with my bags - the lift is tiny so it was a tight squeeze. suite - was on the 4th floor with great views - to the bosphorus as well as taksim square There was a spacious lounge and dining room with comfortable contemporary furniture . It also had desk /chair in a corner . Large flat screen TV with a DVD player The separate bedroom had a king size bed , lots of storage space , and another tv The bathroom was large and very well lit , had a huge shower and lots of space for toiletries . It was stocked with Dove soap , shampoo etc The small kitchenette at the entrance was well equipped with a microwave , oven/stove , kettle , toaster and good quality crockery/cutlery…

title: Very neat and great location hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations.   We are very proud of our team here at the Taxim Suites, they have built a reputation of excellence through their hard work and dedication to guest satisfaction.   Yours in hospitality,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Good place for family
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: nice Hotel
review: It's very clean and the furniture is so modern and new. Big and wide. Small kitchen with living room separated bed room. The view is amazing on the Bosporus. The stuff are very helpful and speak English and some Arabic. They have good advise about tours and best access to touristic places. Breakfast is available but not wow. But the sitting dinning area is so beautiful. Highly recommended

title: Wonderful Suite / Great location in Taxim / Great Value
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Taxim Suites,  We strive to deliver genuine hospitality from the heart and we are so please to hear our staff was able to provide you great overall service.   We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Yours Sincerely  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Superb
review: it is a nice lovely hotel in the heart of Istanbul city  the staff are so kind and it Is very calm Hotel  the food is very tasty and it is so easy from this Hotel to visit any place in Istanbul  thanks for the staff there

title: Highly recommended!
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Many thanks for taking the time to comment on our property.   I was very pleased to read you were satisfied with the level of our service. This is great to hear and I will pass on the compliments to our team.  Look forward to welcoming you back to the Taxim Suites.  Best regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Great Location & Very Friendly Staff
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. title: Exceptional
review: I stayed for 6 nights in two bedroom apartment. Room size was excellent with great view and very clean. The stuff was friendly especially Miss Bahar and Mr. Mohammed. They agree to change my reservation from the penthouse to two bedroom without any problem or extra money. The penthouse is not recommended for family with young kids since the ladder is very small, i recommend this suites for everyone.  Mohammed

title: Fantastic hotel in brilliant location
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit and for taking the time to share your positive comment with us. Feedback such as yours is very valuable and will help us to improve our service and product.   I am glad to hear that we in general met and in some areas even exceeded your expectations and that we took good care of you. And I did pass your positive comments to the relevant staff for recognition, and they are greatly inspired.   Looking forward to welcoming you back soon to your "home" in Istanbul I remain  Yours Sincerely  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Very good location
review: Good location ,excellent staff ,well maintained rooms and fast services,nice view very close to Taksim Medan ,close to bus and metro and istklal street ,all around restaurants and very close to suprermarkets

title: awesome....Taksim Penthouse and Bosphorous Penthouse....Beauty..
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Many thanks for taking the time to comment on our property.   I was very pleased to read you were satisfied with the level of our service. This is great to hear and I will pass on the compliments to our  team.  Look forward to welcoming you back to the Taxim Suites.  Best regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Perfect location, for family visits and business travellers
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Great for a Couple
review: Perfect location next to the Taksim transport hub for metro, airport buses, taxis and the ferries at Kabatas.  Five minutes from the best restaurants and nightlife in the city.   All the space and facilities you need for an extended business trip or holiday are in the suites - small kitchen, living room with space to entertain a dozen or more people and have meetings or use as working space.  Lovely Bosphorus views from the Avenue Suites  There's traffic noise, but it's one of the few places in central Istanbul where one does not hear the call to prayer - which can hit many hotels from several directions at five AM on summer mornings.    The staff were always exceptionally helpful, no matter what the request or questions about travel and life in Istanbul.    There's a pleasant…

title: Holiday trip
review: Dear Guest, First of all we would like to thank you for coosing to stay atTaxim Suites  and thank you for  your kind review.  it was a great pleasure off meeting with you and we look forward to seeing you again in near future. Best Regards Zeynep Siseci

title: Great location, worth it
review: Excellent location and well connected by Bus, Tram, Metro, Fennicular, and Taxis (of course). Faces the nice Geti Park and a pleasant walk to Taksim Square. This district houses all the upper end Hotels of Istanbul too. Equally good for business as well as leisure.  The building is old but well renovated. Almost every amenity such as Free Internet, TVs (2), a music system, a work desk, bar, mini fridge, microwave, electric stove, pots, pans, crockery and cutlery, a jacuzzi,  and the usual toiletries are provided. The suite is very clean and well serviced. Food of several cuisines is close at hand (within walking distance).  The staff is extremely helpful hard working and pleasant. They guided us in detail every time we were setting out to any location.  Till yesterday, it was…

title: Best Suites ever, spacious rooms, gorgeous staff, great location
review: Dear Guest, First of all we would like to thank you for coosing to stay at Taxim Suites  and thank you for  your kind review. it was a great pleasure off meeting with you. Look forward to seeing you again in near future. Best Regards Zeynep Siseci

title: Small hotel big rooms, needs attention to small details
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Excellent, exept the noise....
review: We stayed here 4 nights in June 2014. We arrived from hailing a cab at the airport but the taxi guy had no clue about this hotel, which gave us the feeling its going to be a small hotel. Finally when we arrived we entered the reception, which is perhaps the smallest I have seen ever.  We had booked the rooms almost 5-6 months in advance and sent 3-4 email requests for top floor and park suites. We were gives high floors as requested and check in at around noon time which is the time we reached. This is much appreciated. But we dint get the park suite, I was hoping for that as we booked well in advance and sent requests.   We were charged and made to pay 100% payment while checking in which I have never seen before in so many hotels I have stayed around the world.   The positive:…

title: Tasteful, clean and welcoming accommodation
review: Dear Guest, First of all we would like to thank you for coosing to stay Taxim Suites and thank you for your kind review, it was a great pleasure off meeting with you. Look forward to seeing you again in near future. Best Regards Zeynep Siseci

title: Superb central location
review: This apartment hotel is spacious, cozy, located at very convenient place and the staff are very friendly and helpful.  The only problem I had was the loud noise coming from the outside traffic day and night.

title: very nice suites
review: Dear Valued Guest  Thank you very much indeed for staying with us during your recent visit to İstanbul and for your thoughtful review.  I am pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. I am happy to find that you were satisfied with our hospitality except the traffic noise ;but ı would like to inform you that we covered all windows with double glass technology and it prevent from the traffic noises which comes from outside.   I would like to thank you once again, and look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you again with us in the near future.  With warmest regards   Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Very noisy & poor quality beds
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Clean and Comfortable
review: Suite is spacious and comfortable but this hotel is very very noisy . Unless you are hard of hearing, you just cannot sleep . You need earplugs . Street lights and horns are maddening all night .   Location is perfect if you are young and enjoy horrendously busy street .

title: Feeling like Home
review: Dear Valued Guest  Thank you very much for sharing your valuable feedback via TripAdvisor.  With aspiration to always exceed guest expectations, we have unfortunately fallen short of this goal during your recent stay. While it was a pleasure hosting you in here as our guest , the issues you have experienced made us feel very sorry. Please do accept our sincere apology.  Your valued feedback highlighted a number of areas for improvement ,ı would like to inform you that we renovated all the windows with double glass technologies and it prevents the noises which comes from outside.  Thank you for providing feedback that will ultimately help improve our service perspective and effectiveness.   Sincerely  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Decent Aparthotel
review: I was in Istanbul for 2 weeks, staying with a friend, when 5 days to the end of a trip I was forced to look for a hotel due to a severe allergy attack (cats). I went through search and couldn't find anything less than $200 a night. Luckily, I remembered passing Taxim Suites many times on my walks to the Taksim metro and decided to check out the website. For some reason the hotel didn't come up on my initial search through a regular travel site. Less than $150? Check. Close to the metro? Check. I was ecstatic. I quickly booked it and was very pleased with the room. I stayed in the Japanese-themed suite, which was quite large. My favorite was a little couch in a nook that was very comfortable. The hotel was clean and the receptionists were nice (and not creepers!). The location is…

title: friendly staff and very comfortable room
review: Dear Valued Guest  Greetings from Taxim Suites Istanbul  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. It was great pleasure to host you.Your feedback will be shared with the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional guest service.   We hope to welcome you, whenever your travel needs bring you to this beautiful city Istanbul.  Sincerely,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: I fell in love with taxim
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. title: pleasent surprise in Istanbul
review: Amazing hotel service location city will do it again for sure we were three girls felt very safe and welcomed workers were helpful and friendly it was a great experience I advide u to stsy in this hotel

title: Great hotel for travel with kids
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations.  We are very proud of our  team here at the Taxim Suites, they have built a reputation of excellence through their hard work and dedication to guest satisfaction.   Yours in hospitality,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Good Hotel/Suites
review: I stayed at Taxim suites  for 10 days with my family. The purpose of the trip was a conference as well as personal holiday. I have researched hotels near the Istanbul convention center extensively and chose Taxim suites because it offered us a suite with a large living room and a decent size bedroom as well as a small kitchenette. It sleeps three people easily with a bed placed in the living room for us and a king size bed in the bedroom. There's ample storage and closet space. There was free WiFi during our stay with excellent connection speed. The kitchenette has dishes and supplies for four people and you can do minor cooking. There's a small fridge which was very useful and a microwave and a two burner electric stove. The bathroom is decent size and has a western style…

title: Great home away from home
review: Dear Valued Guest   Greetings from Istanbul  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. It was great pleasure to host you.Your feedback will be shared with the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional guest service.   Yes like a every big cities all over the world some of the taxi driverstry to cheating the tourists in Istanbul please inform us if you realise for charging extra money from that kind of people or call the police (155) directly but dont forget to take number of plate which is written on the cab;the cost of the taxi is almost 60-65  Turkısh Lıra's from Ataturk Internatıonal Airport to the Taxim Suites in 2015.  I would like to thank you once again, and look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you again with us in the near future.  With warmest regards  Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: good location
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. title: Best place
review: the hotel is very well located just a few minutes away from the main sq and shopping...the hotel staff was very friendly and helpfull.rooms r clean and spacious. breakfast was very average. dont bother with it.all in all we would def stay here again.

title: Comfortable and relaxed
review: Dear Valued Guest  Thank you for sharing your experience at the Taxim Suites Hotel  through Tripadvisor  We appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you had a great stay. With a spirit to serve, we take great pride in meeting your expectations  I am pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. I am happy to find that you were satisfied with our hospitality.I would like to inform you that we have been  changed our  breakfast  style from continental breakfast   to the open buffet breakfast.  I would like to thank you once again, and look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you again with us in the near future.  With warmest regards  Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Well located
review: Super hotel nothing to say more! The best place to stay. Tres bon hotel, emplacement tres bon, super staff. Mukemmel yeri konumu ve çalisanlari mukemmel... Tesekkurler Divan . Gezi den sevgiler...hepimiz sizi seviyoruz..yardimseverliginiz asla unutulamaz gecerken hep merhaba demek isteriz artik. No doubt about it, its at the center of the city, the staff is perfect.

title: Well located
review: Merhabalar  Taxim Suites'i tercih ettiğiniz için ve özellikle otelimize bağlılığınız için çok teşekkür ederiz. Sizlerden gelen yorumların bizim için çok değerli olduğunu ve en yüksek kalite standartlarını gerçekleştirebilmemizde yorumlarınızın çok önemli olduğunu bildirmek isteriz.  Son kalışınız sırasında da genel olarak beklentilerinizi karşılamayı başardığımızı öğrenmekten memnuniyet duyduk.   Taxim Suites olarak çok yakın zamanda sizi yeniden otelimizde ağırlamayı ümit ediyoruz.  Saygılarımla,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: An unexpected surprise
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Mediocre & too expensive for its quality...
review: My husband was going to Istanbul for a week so I decided to pack up our 15 month old and join him. We chose to stay at Taxim Suites because of it's location and the fact that it was a suite rather than just a room (which I highly recommend when travelling with little people). But our week there was such a pleasant surprise as I felt like we became a part of a family. They treated us like royalty and went over the top to be helpful and kind. The rooms were clean, well decorated, well equipped and quite large. We even used their babysitter a couple times to go out and enjoy the night life of Istanbul. There is also a fantastic restaurant attached to the hotel if you don't want to go far to find really good food. I can't say enough great things about this hotel and it's staff. Well…

title: The central place to stay!
review: Dear valued guest  Thank you for taking time to write a review on tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you find our hotel amazing, that is what we aim for!  I will look forward to hear from you and hope to also see you back with us soon again. Once again thank you for the positive comments!  Best Wishes  Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Very bad value for money
review: This is a mediocre and way too expensive hotel for what it has to offer... Service is average and the staff indifferent. Horrible view from the rooms we were staying, way too small bathroom. Nobody spoke English and there was no internet service.

title: "feel as at home, during travel to Istanbul!"
review: Dear Ms. Christina E  Thank you very much for sharing your valuable feedback via TripAdvisor.  With aspiration to always exceed guest expectations, we have unfortunately fallen short of this goal during your recent stay. While it was a pleasure hosting you in here as our guest , the issues you have experienced made us feel very sorry.   But ı would like to inform you that ,Our receptionists can speak English and other languages as well and all of the hotel guests can use the complimentary High speed internet in Taxim Suites .  You were a group with 10 girls and we were arrange you 3 different suites,2 of them with park and sea view and the other suites size was as same as your room,how could if our hotel and rooms were bad quality that the other girls were happy with their rooms and accomodation,please check your roommates (Ms. Renee1983 ) reviews which published in Trip Advisor 16'th of April 2013 after you.  Nevertheless, I would like to discuss these mentioned issues with you in detail at your convenience and would appreciate if you could kindly contact me directly at teoman@taximsuites.com referring to this review in the email title.   Together with our team, I hope to welcome you back to The Taxim Suites Istanbul soon again, in order to show you our improved Turkish hospitality and genuine care.  Sincerely  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Outstanding service
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: The best 'home from home' apart-hotel in Istanbul....
review: Nice central location, and great modern rooms.  But the real attraction is the staff: some of the best, personalized service I have ever received in a hotel of any kind.  We were traveling with a small child and everyone--from the front desk to the cleaning staff--went out of their way to make sure that we had everything we needed.

title: Very good location
review: Dear Valued Guest  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your kind feedback.  It is always important to us to hear about our guests' experience during their stay at the Taxim Suites Hotel.Please be assured that we will take your comments and impressions seriously and do our best to meet our esteemed guests' expectations to make sure future visits will be to their satisfaction.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Best regards   Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Best Location and beatiful bosphorus view
review: I always stay at Taxim Suites when I visit Istanbul (several times a year). The suites are modern, spacious, fully-equipped & comfortable, a real home - from - home. The open plan kitchen means I can relax in the evening (wifi, TV etc), if I don't feel like going out (Faros Restaurant on the ground floor have great food and offer room service!). The staff are attentive & friendly and always on-hand to offer their help. I can't fault their professionalism. Location wise, Taxim Suites is perfect. 5 minutes in a taxi and you're in Nisantasi shopping district or the Bosphorus and, walking distance to Beyoglu, the bohemian Istanbul. All in all, whether for business or pleasure, this is a great little gem of a place to base yourselves.

title: istanbul's greatest treasure
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your kind comments on this website.  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, appreciating both our facilities and service. It is a real pleasure to receive such positive feedback.  I look forward to welcoming you back to the Taxim Suites soon.  Kind regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: All in ONE (:
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: The best place in Istanbul !!
review: If you visit Istanbul , and you haven't been in Taxim Suites !! I think you missed a lot of joy and happiness . In this hotel , you will find nice rooms, excellent services ,fabulous location with good price . And the most important thing that you will  find a very kind  & helpful staff with a wonderful management *****

title: Oasis in Istanbul
review: Dear Valued Guest  Thank you for choosing to stay at İstanbul Taxim Suites,  and taking the time to share your comments which are really helpful for the entire our team to improve our services.   It was a pleasure to learn that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Your kind compliments regarding the quality of our services and facilities are very much appreciated.   With our sincere wishes to see you again at our hotel as our team members will be dedicated to ensure your comfort and well-being once again.  Best Regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Very convenient
review: I am going to Istanbul on a regular base and finally I found this place which to me is like home. Great rooms, great people what more do you want !! Miss Zenep and Mr Toleman are absolutely brilliant and I thanks them for making my stays special ones every time !! If you want to come and visit Istanbul, this is the place where to stay.

title: Great hotel, lot's of room for families
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your kind feedback.  It is always important to us to hear about our guests' experience during their stay at the  Taxim Suites Hotel.Please be assured that we will take your comments and impressions seriously and do our best to meet our esteemed guests' expectations to make sure future visits will be to their satisfaction.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Best regards   Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Great rooms! Less than helpful front desk.
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Very comfortable suite, great location
review: After staying at another hotel near Taksim Square, we returned to Istanbul and stayed at Taxim Suites. The location is great. The suites are modern and very comfortable with well-stocked kitchen. The TV is only in the living area. They supply one bottle of water for your entire stay, although when challenged on this (we stayed 4 days and some of the tour books told us to use bottled water for brushing teeth as well as drinking), they did credit us for additional water that we requested in our room. We stayed in a Park Suite and could see the Bosphorus in the distance out our window. The room faced a busy street, so if you are sensitive to noise, you might want to go with a Miyako Suite which doesn't overlook the park but may be quieter. The modern buses that run to both airports…

title: Great hotel-apartment. Enjoyed our stay
review: Dear Valued Guest  Thank you very much for sharing your valuable feedback via TripAdvisor.  Your valued feedback highlighted a number of areas for improvement that I have shared with the management who join me in offering their apologies once again, thank you for providing feedback that will ultimately help improve our guest service perspective and effectiveness.   Together with our team, I hope to welcome you back to The Taxim Suites Istanbul soon again, in order to show you our improved Turkish hospitality and genuine care.  Best wishes,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Loved My Stay
review: The Taxim Suites are a great value and very comfortable. The rooms are bright and airy, lots of space, and well designed. We were there for 5 nights and this was a great alternative to a regular hotel room. The location is ideal-very close to Taxim Square and the convention center, with lots of restaurants in close proximity. Taxi to Old Town was about 20 TL, and a quick ride (as long as it wasn't rush hour); public transportation was fairly easy to manuveur. Free internet was a big plus, and no difficulty with the connection. The hotel staff was unobtrusive but helpful when needed. My only complaint was the bathtub/shower needed new grout--although very clean, it looked dingy and this took away from the ambiance.

title: Excellent stay, great apartment and fantastic service & location
review: Dear Valued Guest  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. We are very pleased that you liked our  Suites and enjoyed our services immensely  I would like to inform you that we renovated all showers in 2015.  I would like to thank you once again, and look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you again with us in the near future.  With warmest regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: The only place I want to stay in Istanbul
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Great location, Clean & Large room, affordable price.
review: I've stayed at the Taxim Suites Hotel 4-5 times. The last time was in 2010, before coming back again this time in June 2012. I absolutely love this hotel. It's not your normal kind of hotel, it is more like having your own apartment but in a hotel. All of the rooms are a great size and have a living room, a bedroom, and a kitchen. YOu really feel like you are at home. The TV works great as does the WIFI ( which is of utmost importance to me). It is clean and well-kept. The location is fantastic if you want to stay in the new part of the city, right near Taxim Square. It is close enough to Taxim Square (across the street) and to Istikal Street, but far enougb away that it is calm and peaceful. There is a restaurant downstairs called Faros, with free wifi and great foood and…

title: Great location, good amenities, excellent service
review: My dearest guest,  I would like to thank you for your review about Taxim Suites  Hotel on tripadvisor.I appreciate your kind comments.  Do not forget us and please contact us if you need any kind of assistance about Istanbul or Turkey.  Hope to see you soon.  Best Wishes from Istanbul  Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites Ast. Manager

title: Penthouse
review: I make a business trip in istanbul for 7 days. I saw on the internet there is an offer with attractive prices in Taxim suites. and when I stay at Taxim suites, my choice is correct. Very good location, very close to taksim square, metro and bus terminal. Very easy to find places to eat and shop. In addition, room in taxim is incredible. Very large compared to the hotel, there is a clean and comfortable living room, there is a kitchen equipped with cooking utensils and cutlery are complete. I can also use their own laundry facilities in basement. And they have a friendly reception staff. I highly recommend to stay in the Taxim suites when visiting  istanbul.

title: Enjoy living like locals in the heart of Istanbul
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experience at the Taxim Suites Hotel  through Tripadvisor  We appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you had a great stay. With a spirit to serve, we take great pride in meeting your expectations.  Your feedback is integral to our ability to continue to improve our service. Thank you again for your time and come visit us again soon!  Best Regards  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Perfect!
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Felt like home
review: 4 of us attended a wedding in Istanbul and most of the out of town guests stayed at taxim suites, around 20 of us. Our room(avenue suite) wasn't ready for us when we checked in at around 3 am, so they gave us 2 rooms, the Miyako and park suite. They were so accommodating that it could have been normal business hours by anyone's standards. I don't need to post any pics because the rooms are exactly as shown on their site. They moved us into the avenue suite the next day, and we had no problems with 4 of us in the suite for 9 nights.  The location is awesome and although Faros restaurant is super, there is a fantastic home style Turkish restaurant across the street with eat in or take away for a real authentic Turkish meal. I accidentally forgot my jacket there and Teoman from the…

title: We simply fell in love with Taxim suites.....
review: Dear  Valued Guest  Thank you very much indeed for staying with us during your recent visit to İstanbul  and for your thoughtful review.  I am pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. I am happy to find that you were satisfied with our  hospitality.  I would like to thank you once again, and look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you again with us in the near future.  With warmest regards  Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites Ast. Manager

title: Cant wait to go back
review: If you want to stay in the Taxim Square area and avoid the noice, Taxim Suites is a great choice. Beautifully decorated in a  modern japanese style, our Miyako Suite was spacious and cosy with full amenities and free wifi, just the apartment I'd wish to have back home! The staff was very friendly and helpful, ready to answer any questions, make reservations for us etc. No need to upload any photos cause it is exactly as shown on the website. I definitely recommend it.

title: Great Aparthotel, excellent location near Taxim square
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for your time and review about our property.   It is great to read that you had an enjoyable stay with us.   We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Your Sincerely  Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites Ast. Manager

title: Amazing aparthotel, warm staff and great breakfast
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: Nothing but good about this aparthotel
review: I spent 4 nights in Istanbul on holiday last week at this aparthotel and had a great time. As another reviewer said the only difficulty was leaving the apartment each day!   I had a 5th floor Miyako suite and really liked the layout and practicality of the fittings. The spa bath was a strong pulse and very nice on aching soles after a day pounding the pavement.   The bed is really comfortable, the wake up alarm on time and nicely spoken.   The staff really try hard to make sure you are happy. The aircon was operating but not cooling the room when I moved in, and they sent a technician in within 30 mins (it was after 9pm) and it was working by 10pm. I really am impressed by this approach.   The breakfast was in the Faros restaurant downstairs, and was a hot and cold buffet with…

title: Fantastic!
review: Dear Ms. Prendergast,  Thank you for taking time to write a review on tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you find our hotel amazing, that is what we aim for!  I will look forward to hear from you and hope to also see you back with us soon again. Once again thank you for the positive comments!  Sincerely  Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Jewel in the crown.
review: I stayed here on a business trip in June 2011 for 6 days. This is an all aparthotel with about 25 apartments I guess. For the price of a 3 star hotel you have a five star apartment!! And a lot more space. I felt very much at home after a long working day. Just look at their excellent website, which shows you exactly how it is. They show a floor plan of each apartment type.   The apartments are spacious (living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom) and nicely modern decorated, a bit Scandinavian style I would say. Free Wifi that worked fine and a good desk to work. I stayed in an Avenue apartment at the 6th floor. I even had a view on the Bosporus! I also saw a Park apartment as a friend of us stayed there and this was also very good.   The hotel is located at a very busy road, but…

title: A rip off
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for choosing to stay at Taxim Suites  and taking the time to share your comments which are really helpful for the entire  team to improve our services.   It was a pleasure to learn that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Your kind compliments regarding the quality of our services and facilities are very much appreciated.   With our sincere wishes to see you again at our hotel as our team members will be dedicated to ensure your comfort and well-being once again.   Kind Regards,   Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Excellent rooms & close to the where all the action takes place
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: An absolutely great hotel!
review: First off the rooms, look exactly like they do on the website photos. Leaving you feelign like a King Secondly, it is close to the epicenter of Istanbul - namely Taksim Sq, and about 7 mins walk from Kabatas (for the Bosphorus ferries) and the main pedestrianised shopping street The lady running the hotel, went out of her way to make us feel welcome and was very helpful in answering any questions we had.  All in all, a very positive experience - i cannot fault this hotel

title: Excellent
review: Dear Valued Guest  Thank you very much for sharing this post regarding your stay in 2010. It is a great pleasure to read that you  enjoyed the location of the hotel, you were happy with service and had a memorable experience.  We look forward to welcoming you again during your future trips to Istanbul...  Best Regards,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Fabulous location - wonderful modern aesthetic
review: 1. When I entered my suite I was astonished, it had everything I needed, and more: it was big, modern, fresh, excellently equipped. The only problem I had was that I did not want to leave the room.  2. The stuff is very helpful, they could explain to me for hours how I could go to the places I wanted to visit or where I could find what I want. Especially the hotel's manager, Zeynep, has been VERY helpful and friendly. Also there was nothing "fake" in their behavior. You would not feel a tourist, but their friend.  3. The location is excellent, just a few metres from taksim square and Istiklal street.   4. The price is very reasonable.  I have the best memories, I will definitely go there again, and I have already recommended this hotel to everyone I know.

title: Best Suite Hotel I ever stayed in my whole travel experience.
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your kind feedback.  It is always important to us to hear about our guests' experience during their stay at the  Taxim Suites Hotel.Please be assured that we will take your comments and impressions seriously and do our best to meet our esteemed guests' expectations to make sure future visits will be to their satisfaction.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Best regards   Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites

title: Comfortable and convenient!
review: Istanbul’s most famous street, pedestrianized Istiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), throbs day and night and offers a fantastic array of architectural sights, shops, treats, and throngs upon teeming throngs of people. At the avenue’s northeastern end is expansive Taksim Square, thought by many to be the very heart of the city, with many of Turkey’s most renowned restaurants and some of Europe’s most happening nightlife in close proximity. In striking contrast, Beyoglu’s less trafficked areas – such as the affluent Cihangir and the antiques district of Cukurcuma – exude Old World charm and provide contemplative calm and splendid diversion via an assortment of cozy cafes, attractive boutiques, and quiet lanes.

title: I am in love with Taxim Suites.
review: Istanbul is the most exciting city in the world for me, and I have visited many times in more than 20 years.  When I decided to spend a month, I asked a Turkish friend to recommend a suitable hotel.  This is the only one he mentioned, and I was quickly reassured as I settled in.  My sprawling suite overlooked a lovely park setting with a view of the Bosphorus in the distance.  (Just past a couple of upscale chain hotels costing at least twice as much.)  Yet, I was steps away from a public transportation hub and countless restaurants, shops, bakeries, etc.  This area is teeming with Turks going about their daily lives, so you actually feel like you're THERE.    No disrespect to the tourist areas such as around the Egyptian Spice Bazaar and the Sultanahmet District (a short taxi…

title: Small, modern, very close to Taxim Square
review: Dear   Greetings from İstanbul Taxim Suites  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. It was great pleasure to host you.Your feedback will be shared with the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional guest service.   We hope to welcome you, whenever your travel needs bring you to this beautiful city Istanbul.  Sincerely,  Arman Teoman Yaşlı Taxim Suites
